content.query:
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'mg3M@y67-21';

DROP CREDENTIAL MrCredential

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL MRAzureCredential
WITH
	IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
	SECRET = 'hZSA4nEnXCAwHvpCaIBwDHX4Pohvc5AWDEf3Q2skjbw%3D'

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE BlobStorage
WITH (
	--CREDENTIAL = MRAzureCredential,
	LOCATION = 'abfss://mg3synapsefilesystem@mg3synapsestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/mg3synapsefilesystem/'--,
	--TYPE = HADOOP
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CsvFileFormat
WITH (
	FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
	FORMAT_OPTIONS (
		FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
		STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
		USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
	)
)

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[ExternalTable]
(
	 Car_Name VARCHAR(50),
	 Year INT,
	 Selling_Price FLOAT,
	 Present_Price FLOAT,
	 Kms_Driven FLOAT,
	 Fuel_Type VARCHAR(20),
	 Seller_Type VARCHAR(20),
	 Transmission VARCHAR(20),
	 Owner INT
)
WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'abfss://mg3synapsefilesystem@mg3synapsestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/datasets_33080_1320127_car+data.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = BlobStorage,
	FILE_FORMAT = CsvFileFormat
)
